name: Rusty's Extra Stuff
description: Adds bulldozer vehicle part, an advanced flashlight, a small foldable muffler and controls, a small kitchen unit, a microfridge, a microreactor, plutonium storage batteries small and large w/ reinforced versions, a small plutonium motor that takes no fuel, plutonium headlights that dont need power, and an atomic foot crank, a foldable superalloy frame,  and recipes for all of them, and more.
author: Russell
